table.name: vtiger_warrantydetails
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_warrantydetails` ( `warrantydetailsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `wr_warranty_description` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, `wr_warranty_code` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `wr_warranty_in_mon` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `wr_waranty_hours` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`warrantydetailsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_warrantydetailscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_warrantydetailscf` ( `warrantydetailsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`warrantydetailsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
